016package de.cuioss.uimodel.model.code;
017
018import static de.cuioss.tools.string.MoreStrings.nullToEmpty;
019
020import java.io.Serializable;
021import java.util.Comparator;
022import java.util.Locale;
023
024import lombok.RequiredArgsConstructor;
025
026/**
027 * Helper class comparing to {@link CodeType} regarding their label. It needs a
028 * Locale, in order to call. {@link CodeType#getResolved(Locale)}. In case you
029 * know if the concrete {@link CodeType} ignore the {@link Locale} attribute,
030 * <code>null</code> is permitted.
031 *
032 * @author Oliver Wolff
033 */
034@RequiredArgsConstructor
035public class CodeTypeComparator implements Comparator<CodeType>, Serializable {
036
037    private static final long serialVersionUID = 7747878519156301042L;
038
039    private final Locale locale;
040
041    @Override
042    public int compare(final CodeType type1, final CodeType type2) {
043        final var type1Name = nullToEmpty(type1.getResolved(locale));
044        final var type2Name = nullToEmpty(type2.getResolved(locale));
045
046        return type1Name.compareTo(type2Name);
047    }
048
049}
